reviews.review_text: It can be difficult to figure out exactly what it is you need to do at any given time, but that's a lot of the appeal right there: this one doesn't hold your hand as much as similar examples of the genre. The art style is very unique, and the music creates the desired ambience. I personally love it. As long as you can handle some frustration, at the level of a moderately hard platformer game, you'll have a very good time.
